situation.title: Struggle for Freedom and Democracy Day

content.processed:
Recommendations

Currently, there is no regime for outdoor movement, the organization of rural events and the gatherings during the commemorative events on 17th November. However, the gathering of people is in general prohibited.

The organizers of some events have already announced the transfer of these events to the Internet or their complete relocation. If you used to attend a similar event regularly, visit the organizers' website for more information.

situation_type.name: CURRENT EVENTS: Velvet Revolution Remembrance Day
